subject: Logitech rs50 on ps5
description_text:
Dear,
Could you let me know if the Plus X pedals can be used in combinatie with
the logitech RS50 hub on a Playstation 5. If so i would be interested in
purchasing a set.
Brgds,
Richard Goudbeek

conversations.body_text: Hi Richard Goudbeek,  Our pedals are currently compatible with PC only and are not supported on PS4, PS5, or Xbox consoles.Â
